abstract: Ajit Jain could be a witness in the trial of Rajat K. Gupta, a former director at Goldman Sachs and Procter & Gamble who is charged with leaking information about those companies.
snippet: Ajit Jain could be a witness in the trial of Rajat K. Gupta, a former director at Goldman Sachs and Procter & Gamble who is charged with leaking information about those companies.
lead_paragraph: Ajit Jain, a top lieutenant at Berkshire Hathaway, is on the short list of candidates to succeed Warren E. Buffett, Berkshire’s chief executive.

headline.main: Insider Jury May Hear From a Top Aide at Berkshire
